document(english): Order of the Government of the Republic of Tajikistan "About the State program of development and implementation of information and communication technologies" 30/08/2022, 13:37Order of the Government of the Republic of Tajikistan "About the … implementation of information and communication technologies" Page 1 of 2 Document from CIS Legislation database © 2003-2022 SojuzPravoInform LLC It is registered Ministry of Justice Republic of Tajikistan On July 10, 2014 No. 539 Prime Minister of the Republic of Tajikistan Emomalii Rahmon ORDER OF THE GOVERNMENT OF THE REPUBLIC OF TAJIKISTAN About the State program of development and implementation of information and communication technologies in the Republic of Tajikistan for 2014-2017 According to article 7 of the Law of the Republic of Tajikistan "About the state forecasts, concepts, strategy and programs of social and economic development of the Republic of Tajikistan" the Government of the Republic of Tajikistan decides: 1. Approve the State program of development and implementation of information and communication technologies in the Republic of Tajikistan for 2014-2017 it (is applied). 2. To the center of information and communication technologies of Executive office of the President of the Republic of Tajikistan, the Ministry of Finance of the Republic of Tajikistan, the Tax Committee under the Government of the Republic of Tajikistan, the Communication service, under the Government of the Republic of Tajikistan, Customs Service under the Government of the Republic of Tajikistan, to Head department on protection of the state secrets under the Government of the Republic of Tajikistan: - together with other ministries and departments, local executive bodies of the government, the relevant organizations and the companies to provide execution of the actions provided by the Program; - each six months inform the Government of the Republic of Tajikistan on the performed works, the available difficulties and ways of their decision. 3. Financing of actions of the Program in 2014-2015 to perform at the expense of own means of the ministries and departments of the Republic of Tajikistan. To the Ministry of economic development and trade of the Republic That tszhikistan, to the Ministry of Finance of the Republic of Tajikistan, the Tax Committee under the Government of the Republic of Tajikistan and the Communication service under the Government of the Republic of Tajikistan: - in case of development of budgets of the central executive bodies of the government within the government budget for 2016-2017 the individual clause of expenses to provide the means necessary for financing of actions of the Program; - for financing of the Program to involve the help of the international financial institutions. 4. Recommend to National Bank of Tajikistan, to Government savings bank of the Republic of Tajikistan Amonatbank and other credit institutions to take part in program implementation. 5. Declare invalid the Order of the Government of the Republic of Tajikistan of December 3, 2004 No. 468 "About approval of the State program of development and implementation of information and communication technologies in the Republic of Tajikistan". 6. To impose control of this resolution on the Center of information and communication technologies of Executive office of the President of the Republic of Tajikistan. The state program of development and implementation of information and communication technologies in the Republic of Tajikistan for 2014-2017 1. Introduction 1. In the modern promptly developing world functioning and development of the state is impossible without application of modern means and technologies of management, communication and communication. As show numerous researches, growth in volumes of information circulating in the field of management shall be based on single information base and requires timely conversion. In these conditions management without application of modern means and methods of processing, transfer and information representation cannot be effective. of July 3, 2014 No. 428 Approved by the Order of the Government of the Republic of Tajikistan of July 3, 2014 No. 428 30/08/2022, 13:37Order of the Government of the Republic of Tajikistan "About the … implementation of information and communication technologies" Page 2 of 2 2. State policy in the field of use of information technologies in public administration is intended to provide increase in efficiency of public administration, justification of the decisions prepared on unified information basis, coordination of activities of public authorities for creation of the state information systems and increase in effectiveness of finance and other costs in this sphere. 3. The created purposes of state policy in the field of development of information technologies determine need of the solution of tasks for plot area of the information society consisting in forming of priorities of development of information technologies in the ministries and departments, creation of the corresponding databases and methods of their use for the purposes of management with the subsequent creation of services for servicing of citizens and the organizations. First of all, these purposes after creation of internal databases require creation of interdepartmental network of data exchange between the ministries and departments for the solution of the tasks set for them. 4. The state program of development and implementation of information and communication technologies for 2014- 2017 (further - the Program) reflects development priorities in the field of information technologies of the republic in the Republic of Tajikistan and is directed to realization of state policy in this sphere according to strategic objectives of development of the Republic of Tajikistan.
